statements: SELECT * FROM player_injuries WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_id, injury_details FROM player_injuries WHERE recovery_progress = 'In Progress'
SELECT * FROM player_injuries WHERE injury_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY injury_date DESC
SELECT player_id, recovery_progress FROM player_injuries WHERE injury_details LIKE '%ankle%'
SELECT count(*) as total_injuries FROM player_injuries
SELECT * FROM player_injuries WHERE recovery_progress = 'In Progress';
SELECT player_id, injury_date FROM player_injuries WHERE injury_details LIKE '%sprain%';
SELECT * FROM player_injuries WHERE injury_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) FROM player_injuries GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT player_id, MAX(injury_date) AS last_injury_date FROM player_injuries GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY last_injury_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, position FROM players WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT player_name, position FROM players ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM injuries WHERE recovery_progress >= 50;
SELECT player_name, position, date_of_birth FROM players WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT * FROM injuries WHERE recovery_progress > 50;
SELECT player_name, position FROM players WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT player_name, injury_details, injury_date FROM players JOIN injuries ON players.player_id = injuries.player_id;
SELECT injury_id, player_id, injury_date FROM injuries WHERE injury_details LIKE '%sprain%';
SELECT player_id, player_name, date_of_birth, position FROM players WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT * FROM injuries WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM injuries
SELECT player_id, injury_date FROM injuries ORDER BY injury_date DESC
SELECT player_name, team_id FROM players WHERE position = 'forward'
SELECT team_name FROM teams
SELECT player_name, position FROM players WHERE team_id=1
SELECT * FROM injuries WHERE injury_date>'2022-01-01' ORDER BY injury_date DESC
SELECT player_name, team_name, position FROM players JOIN teams ON players.team_id=teams.team_id
SELECT player_name, recovery_progress FROM players JOIN injuries ON players.player_id=injuries.player_id WHERE recovery_progress='In progress'
SELECT * FROM injuries WHERE injury_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM player_details;
SELECT player_name, injury_type FROM player_details WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM injury_details ORDER BY treatment_method DESC;
SELECT player_name, recovery_progress FROM player_details WHERE injury_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM recovery_logs WHERE log_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM player_details WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT player_name, injury_type FROM player_details WHERE recovery_progress = 'In Progress' ORDER BY player_name DESC;

SELECT p.player_name, i.injury_description, r.progress_status FROM player_details p JOIN injury_details i ON p.player_id = i.player_id JOIN recovery_progress r ON i.injury_id = r.injury_id WHERE r.progress_status = 'Complete';
SELECT * FROM recovery_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM recovery_progress rp JOIN injury_details id ON rp.injury_id = id.injury_id WHERE id.player_id = 101 ORDER BY rp.progress_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, position FROM players WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM teams WHERE team_id = 5;
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth FROM players ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT coach_name, years_coaching FROM coaches WHERE years_coaching > 5;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE team_id = 1 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_injuries WHERE injury_date >= '2022-01-01' AND injury_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY injury_date ASC;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, founded_date FROM teams WHERE coach_name LIKE 'J%' OR coach_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY founded_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, position FROM players WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' AND position = 'quarterback';
SELECT coach_name, years_coaching FROM coaches WHERE years_coaching >= 10 ORDER BY years_coaching DESC, coach_name ASC;
